sources.title: Black Sheep 1936 Edmund Lowe
sources.description: Title: Black Sheep Summary: On a cruise ship a professional gambler comes to the aid of a young man victimized by a jewel thief. The young man turns out to be his son. Directed by: Allan Dwan Actors: Edmund Lowe, Claire Trevor, Tom Brown Production Company: Fox Film Corporation Release Date: 14 June 1935 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 On a cruise ship a professional gambler comes to the aid of a young man victimized by a jewel thief. The young man turns out to be his son.

metadata.Plot: On a cruise ship a professional gambler comes to the aid of a young man victimized by a jewel thief. The young man turns out to be his son.
metadata.Actors: Edmund Lowe, Claire Trevor, Tom Brown
